search_results.snippet:
A porter is a railway employee. The role of a porter is to assist passengers at 
railway stations, and to handle the loading, unloading, and distribution of 
luggage and parcels. In the United States the term is also used for staff who 
attend to passengers ... Other career progressions were also common on some 
railways.
